result.text:
Studies have shown that the tainted water from the Fukushima nuclear power plant contains more than 60 radionuclides, including tritium, a long-lived and toxic element inseparable from water. If released into the Pacific Ocean, the radioactive material will find its way into the food chain, thus bringing detrimental damage to both marine environments and human health. 
https://t.co/kJPTymI79k

legacy.full_text:
G20 Sherpa @amitabhk87 speaks to News9's @nehakhanna_07 on Global Lens. Kant calls China a multilateral player in G20. He says China has played a constructive role in the G20.

WATCH only on News9
https://t.co/z91NyfSyYp

#China #G20 #G20India https://t.co/4rJZmYipEm
Time and facts tell China "plays a very constructive and positive role, let me tell you that, in the G20", said G20 Sherpa Mr. Amitabh Kant.
